Bernie Sanders , a liberal independent from Vermont, applauded Republicans for picking Paul Ryan , saying that unlike GOP leaders who have been vague about what programs they want to cut, Congressman Paul Ryan has been very clear. He added that Paul Ryan 's ideas on squeezing savings from Social Security, Medicare, Medicaid and other programs were`` a very wrong approach to take.'' Mike Pence Jim Ryun , is working with a well-connected conservative public relations firm to convince Mike Pence to run for president. Mike Pence says he will decide by the end of the month, so the effort it intensifying. For all the praise they heap on the congressman- and his fans tend to be effusive- it's also plain that what makes him so compelling is the perception that he lacks the flaws of the other candidates currently in the presidential mix, Politico reports. NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers .
